description:
Tommy's back to his antics again, and this time he's doing his thing in his new hot-rod truck in some strangers driveway.

This last weekend, the sun was out, the birds were chirping, and Tommy was out cruising. Not wanting to waste a ton of gas going nowhere, he thought it'd be a good idea to find a nice shady spot and spend some time stroking his cock.

Once Tommy found a nice large, empty driveway, he put his ride in park, unzipped and started stroking for the home run.

After getting off, Tommy didn't bother putting his clothes back on, he just fired up his truck and drove off, cum still dripping down his chest.

Enjoy!
title: Sticky Drive
